summary: Explores the myth of the secret multi-billion-dollar deal behind America's purchase of Yugoslavia's clandestine space program in the early 1960s.
cast: Slavoj Zizek|Josip Broz Tito|John F. Kennedy|Lyndon B. Johnson|David Scott|Dean Rusk|Richard Nixon|Jimmy Carter|Bill Clinton|Michael Reed|Bozidar Smiljanic
title: Houston, We Have a Problem
